text: hi i have a test app account that doesn’t have trial access enabled, so i can’t test workflows etc. i’ve connected my app and done an API call to it. i just created it today. any idea what might be going wrong?
Can you describe the actual problem you’re running into?

Sure of course. I am creating a HubSpot app. I have a developer account for my app. 

Within the developer account, you can create test accounts for testing your app. 

From the docs, it seems that each test account should have an enterprise trial — that can be renewed. However my rest accounts do not have this. So I can’t test workflows etc. 

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/account-types|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/account-types>
